description: Six recipes based on a given root, with room for improvisation. Bake beets instead of celeriac; make creamy potato soup, braise carrots, braise parsnips and so on.
title: Root Vegetable Recipes
title_page: Root Vegetable Recipes - Interactive Feature - NYTimes.com
text: Each recipe below is based on a given root, but feel free to mess around. Bake beets instead of celeriac; make creamy potato soup, braise carrots, braise parsnips and so on. Related Article Â»
